t: Ships in Product Packaging for FBA - Amazon Packaging
s: The Ships in Product Packaging (SIPP) program, formerly known as Ships in Own Container (SIOC), offers sellers that use FBA the opportunity to test and qualify products to ship to customers in their own custom-brand packaging without any Amazon-added material.

t: Amazon to expand ships-in-own-packaging push in 2024 | Packaging Dive
s: September 20, 2023 - Amazon said its Ships in Product Packaging program, formerly known as Ship in Own Container, allows it to work with sellers on redesigning packaging so products ship in branded product packaging without added Amazon delivery packaging.
